attributes.action: at the earliest opportunity, and not later then the next budget, allow couples to transfer their individual tax allowances to each other
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would make it more possible for families to have either a mother or father remain at home. The benefits to society could be immense, it could reduce crime and help with children's education. It would also ensure that where one person remains at home that their indivdual tax allowance is not wasted.
